transforms.code:
# Removes columns from a dataset. colsRemove should be a list of column names to remove. """
	headers = system.dataset.getColumnHeaders(value) #check headers
	columnsToShow = []
	for col in headers:
		if col != "Level" and col != "Process Value": 
			columnsToShow.append(col)

	ds = system.dataset.filterColumns(value, columnsToShow)
	
	
	return ds
